title: Minotaur Audio Pack
description: A Sample pack where developers can craft their own sounds for a  Minotaur like creature
longDescription:
This is a construction pack that includes numerous audio files for creating sounds of a Minotaur

I have included Hoof Charge, Head Charge, Ambience and Voice


Audio Demo


Ceramic Impact 1 The sound of headbut in ceramic debris

Ceramic Impact 2 The sound of headbut in ceramic debris

Ceramic Impact 3 The sound of headbut in ceramic debris

Concrete Impact 1 The sound of headbut in concrete debris

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Impacts SFX on different materials
  • Headbutt
  • Impale
  • Steps
  • Vocalization (With Armor on)
  • Vocalization (Without Armor on)


Number of Audio Waves: 178

Number of Audio Cues: 178

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz 24Bit)

Do Sound FX loop: (Some of them Do)

Minutes of audio provided: 10:56

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes: None
